thread.title: BSNL’s new Rs 149 plan offers 30 minutes of free calling per day for a month
thread.title_full: BSNL’s new Rs 149 plan offers 30 minutes of free calling per day for a month

title: BSNL’s new Rs 149 plan offers 30 minutes of free calling per day for a month
text:
BSNL’s new Rs 149 plan offers 30 minutes of free calling per... BSNL’s new Rs 149 plan offers 30 minutes of free calling per day for a month By January 24, 2017 “BSNL’s new plans are for new subscribers only” 
Earlier this month, BSNL launched a new promotional plan of Rs 144, which offered unlimited calling to any network and 300MB of data for 28 days. Now the company has launched two new plans, which offer 30 minutes of free local and STD calls to any network per day. 
The brand’s new Rs 149 plan gives you 30 minutes of free local and STD calling to any network for a month. The Rs 439 plan offers 30 minutes of free calls per day for a period of three months, along with 300MB of data. 
This promotional offer is available across the country starting today for new BSNL subscribers. The plans will be available via BSNL’s channel partners and customer service centres.
